main event: A round, white object the size of a basketball was observed to move slowly and was still in sight at the time of the report.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 3.5 seconds, moving from an altitude of 10,000-20,000 feet to an altitude of 25 feet.
The object's speed was estimated to increase from 3-4 knots to 8-9 knots during the observation.
The witness believed the object was the planet Venus.
The report indicates that the sighting was reviewed and confirmed by an officer.
The report mentions that there was no other military or civilian traffic observed during the sighting.
sighted object: Round, white object the size of a basketball
photographs: No photographs included in the report
